comment: /**  * Sets list of repositories to get  *  * @param repositories list of repositories  * @return builder  */
code: /**  * Sets list of repositories to get  *  * @param repositories list of repositories  * @return builder  */ public GetRepositoriesRequestBuilder setRepositories(String... repositories) {     request.repositories(repositories).     return this. }

comment: /**  * Adds repositories to the list of repositories to get  *  * @param repositories list of repositories  * @return builder  */
code: /**  * Adds repositories to the list of repositories to get  *  * @param repositories list of repositories  * @return builder  */ public GetRepositoriesRequestBuilder addRepositories(String... repositories) {     request.repositories(ArrayUtils.concat(request.repositories(), repositories)).     return this. }
